comments:
Exception when viewing attachments in the Test Log Viewer.

When open an test execution history that contains attachments (see attached execution histories in https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=113601) in the Test Log Viewer using the TPTP-4.1.0-200511170100A build, the following exception is thrown:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.io.File.<init>(File.java:203)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.models.common.facades.behavioral.impl.FacadeResourceImpl.doLoad(FacadeResourceImpl.java:152)

	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorManager$5.run(EditorManager.java:944)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.java:1044)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:783)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorManager.restoreState(EditorManager.java:939)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkbenchPage.restoreState(WorkbenchPage.java:2535)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkbenchWindow.restoreState(WorkbenchWindow.java:1819)

	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.restoreState(Workbench.java:1512)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.access$12(Workbench.java:1491)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench$17.run(Workbench.java:1374)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.java:1044)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:783)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.restoreState(Workbench.java:1318)

After a preliminary investigation, the fixed introduced under defect #115499 to the org.eclipse.hyades.models.common.facades.behavioral.impl.FacadeResourceImpl.doLoad(FacadeResourceImpl.java:152) method appears to be the cause of this defect.  Backing out this fix resolves this defect.
It should be fixed in 4.1, changing target to 4.1i3.

Created an attachment (id=30392)
Patch for org.eclipse.tptp.platform.models
Tested the provided patch on the TPTP-4.1.0-200511170100A build with success.

(In reply to comment #4)
> Fix in CVS.

Please check-in to both HEAD and 4.1.0 CVS streams.
Why the change of target.  Should not this defect be fixed in both HEAD and 4.1.0 CVS streams now and be targetted to 4.1 i3.
OK, I'll do that in a separate bug.
